description: This story humorously explores a mathematician's whimsical encounter with a personified number, highlighting the lighter side of mathematics.
title: The Numerical Dilemma
n_1: Max is intently solving equations when Nora, a lively number zero, makes an entrance.
n_2: Nora playfully dances around, while Max tries to maintain his composure.
c1_2: Please, stay back! I'm not good with negative spaces.
c2_2: But I'm just a zero, not a negative!
n_3: Max, in a panic, hides behind a calculator as Nora continues her cheerful antics.
c1_3: I must avoid negatives at all costs!
c2_3: Come on, I'm nothing to be afraid of!
n_4: Eventually, Max's fear turns to amusement, sharing a smile with the harmless Nora.
